title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.4 - Form of petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.4 - Form of petition

State Regulations

Application shall be made by written petition, accompanied
by suitable exhibits, addressed to the Water Power and Control Commission, Albany, NY, and shall be signed on behalf of applicant by the chief executive
thereof and verified by him. Such petition and exhibits must be filed in
duplicate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
603.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
